actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-387.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 306 - 91 (Record Vote No: 353).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. J. Res. 364) providing statutory authorization under the War Powers Resolution for continued United States participation in the multinational peacekeeping force in Lebanon in order to obtain withdrawal of all foreign forces from Lebanon.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 364 (U.S. armed forces in Lebanon).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. J. Res. 364) providing statutory authorization under the War Powers Resolution for continued United States participation in the multinational peacekeeping force in Lebanon in order to obtain withdrawal of all foreign forces from Lebanon.
